FuncDef: This command specifies the location and name of the CLI script file executed following a redundancy switchover from the previously active CPM card. A switchover can happen because of a fatal failure or by manual action.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the location and name of the CLI script file. Values-local-url | remote-url|, local-url|[cflash-id/][file-path] 200 chars max, including cflash-id, |directory length 99 chars max each, remote-url |[{ftp:// | tftp://}login:pswd@remote-locn/][file-path], |243 chars max, |directory length 99 chars max each, remote-locn |[hostname | ipv4-address | ipv6-address] , ipv4-address |a.b.c.d, ipv6-address |x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x[-interface], |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d[-interface], |x - [0 to FFFF]H, |d - [0 to 255]D, |interface - 32 chars max, for link local addresses, cflash-id |cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:, cf2:, cf2-A:, cf2-B:, cf3:, cf3-A:, cf3-B:.
